DataElement.preferredName: Prior Therapeutic Procedure Timespan Completion Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator to signify whether or not a time period has passed since the completion of the associated prior therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process._The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: The period of time between two dates or events or between the beginning and end of something.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription:
Created for ABTC eligibility checklist for the 1202 Mk-1775 study per request by J.Zhao. mc 5/14/13 Released per approval by Jason. mc 6/13/13
Moved to ABTC Context mc 4/7/14

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have the following time perio
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have the following time periods passed since the completion of their associated prior therapies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ABTC Alt Question Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have the required intervals passed since the end of any applicable protocol-specified prior therapies?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Have completed or will have completed curative-intent adjuvant chemotherapy for any solid tumor malignancy in last 4 weeks. Run-in study procedures can occur during the last 4 weeks of adjuvant chemotherapy but must be completed no later than 4 weeks afte
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have completed or will have completed curative-intent adjuvant chemotherapy for any solid tumor malignancy in last 4 weeks. Run-in study procedures can occur during the last 4 weeks of adjuvant chemotherapy but must be completed no later than 4 weeks after the completion of adjuvant chemotherapy.

ReferenceDocuments.name: URCC19178
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have completed or will have completed curative-intent adjuvant chemotherapy for any solid tumor malignancy in last 6 months.
